name: Augmented Reality Shopping Experience
description: Develop an augmented reality shopping app that allows customers to try on clothes virtually before making a purchase.

name: Blockchain-based Supply Chain Management
description: Create a blockchain-based supply chain management system to increase transparency and accountability in the supply chain.

name: Automated Personal Finance Assistant
description: Build an automated personal finance assistant that helps users manage their finances and investments more effectively.

name: AI-powered Language Learning Platform
description: Create an AI-powered language learning platform that uses natural language processing and machine learning to personalize the learning experience for each user.

name: Smart City Traffic Management System
description: Develop a smart city traffic management system that uses real-time data analysis and predictive modeling to optimize traffic flow and reduce congestion.

name: Social Media Monitoring Tool
description: Build a social media monitoring tool that uses natural language processing and sentiment analysis to help businesses track their online reputation and customer sentiment.

name: E-commerce Personalization Platform
description: Create an e-commerce personalization platform that uses machine learning algorithms to recommend products and personalize the shopping experience for each customer.

name: Smart Home Security System
description: Develop a smart home security system that uses machine learning algorithms to detect and prevent potential security breaches and intrusions.
